title: Transformers: Cyberworld
overview: Join Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, Elita-1, Megatron, Grimlock, and more as they're hurled into the hostile and unknown landscapes of CYBERWORLD. Stranded, disoriented and with no memory of how they got there, they must face a gauntlet of extreme, game-like challenges designed to test their strength, skill and level up as they are pushed to their limit.
